masterlist.text: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
masterlist.author: Ed Cunningham

masterlist.text: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
masterlist.author: Laozi

masterlist.text: Weve got to have a dream if we are going to make a dream come true.
masterlist.author: Walt Disney

masterlist.text: Respect is not something that you can ask for, buy or borrow. Respect is what you earn from each person no matter their background or status.
masterlist.author: Byron Pulsifer

masterlist.text: Don't believe what your eyes are telling you. All they show is limitation. Look with your understanding, find out what you already know, and you'll see the way to fly.
masterlist.author: Richard Bach

masterlist.text: A smile is a light in the window of your face to show your heart is at home.
